name: Relics Of Avabur - Rewamped - Black Repaint_1080p
description:
I DID NONE OF THE CODING FOR THIS!!!
This is a Black Repaint of the Original from Edvordo.
https://userstyles.org/styles/123685/relics-of-avabur-rewamped
additional_info:
Update: Added some transparency so it isn't so flat.
_____________________________
INFO FROM Edvordo: https://userstyles.org/styles/123685/relics-of-avabur-rewamped
_____________________________
Use with the default theme of Avabur!
I will only support the default theme!
_____________________________
Setting your own BACKGROUND:
Since v0.5.5 it is possible to set your own background for ANY color scheme my Theme provides.
If you do not want to change your background and use the default provided by the color scheme, set this field to default!
The format for this field is: url(your_image_url)!important
The only thing you should replace in there it the your_image_url, but make it a short one, since UserStyles.org limits this field to 50 characters, so reupload your images to www.imgur.com or any image hosting service that can give you short links.
In case you want your image stretchend on the full background of the page, you can try a suggestion posted on the discussion forums https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/54224/body-image-suggestion
